name: Curious George Comes Home
summary: Whether he's racing a sailboat, running errands in town or visiting the zoo, Curious George always manages to get himself in a bind. Now, that ever-so-mischievous monkey is in trouble again...and only you can help him!! This critically acclaimed CD-Rom invites children on a free wheeling romp through the friendly and familiar world of Curious George. By actively participating in an ever-changing story- choose places to go, characters to visit and things to do. Children learn storytelling and problem solving in a creative, fun-filled environment.
